subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The unmatched dual success of the men’s and women’s teams has made UConn the one university where the challenge is not only to be the best team in the country, but the most heralded in Storrs, Conn.
snippet: The unmatched dual success of the men’s and women’s teams has made UConn the one university where the challenge is not only to be the best team in the country, but the most heralded in Storrs, Conn.
